Global.metadata.title: Natugraphia - Grau Casanovas photography
Global.metadata.description: Online store to buy photographs of Grau Casanovas, photographer of landscapes, nature and wild animals.

Legal.terms.title: Terms of Service
Legal.terms.description: Terms and conditions for using our services
Legal.terms.content: These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
Legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Legal.privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
Legal.privacy.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
Legal.returns.title: Returns Policy
Legal.returns.description: Information about returns, refunds, and exchanges
Legal.returns.content: Our Returns Policy outlines the conditions and procedures for returning products, requesting refunds, and processing exchanges.
Legal.shipping.title: Shipping Policy
Legal.shipping.description: Information about shipping methods, costs, and delivery times
Legal.shipping.content: This Shipping Policy provides details about our shipping methods, estimated delivery times, and associated costs.
Legal.cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Legal.cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies
Legal.cookies.content: Our Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience.
Legal.gdpr.title: GDPR Rights
Legal.gdpr.description: Your rights under the General Data Protection Regulation
Legal.gdpr.content: This page outlines your rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and how to exercise them.
Legal.returns.sections.returnPeriodConte: You have 14 days from the date of delivery to return your order for a full refund. This period begins the day after you receive your order.
Legal.returns.sections.returnConditionsC: To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.
Legal.returns.sections.returnProcessCont: To initiate a return, please contact us at info@natugraphia.com with your order number and reason for return. We will provide you with return instructions and a return shipping label.
Legal.returns.sections.returnShippingCon: We will provide a prepaid return shipping label for returns within the EU. For international returns, you may be responsible for return shipping costs.
Legal.returns.sections.refundProcessingC: Once we receive and inspect your return, we will notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If approved, your refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.
Legal.returns.sections.nonReturnableItem: Custom or personalized orders, digital downloads, and items marked as non-returnable are not eligible for returns.
Legal.returns.sections.damagedItemsConte: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us immediately. We will arrange for a replacement or refund at no additional cost to you.
Legal.returns.sections.exchangePolicyCon: We currently do not offer exchanges. If you would like a different item, please return your current item and place a new order.
Legal.returns.sections.contactInfoConten: For questions about returns, please contact us at info@natugraphia.com or call our customer service team.
Legal.shipping.sections.shippingMethodsC: We offer several shipping options to meet your needs:
Legal.shipping.sections.shippingCostsCon: Shipping costs are calculated based on your location and the shipping method you select. Free shipping is available for orders over €50 within the EU.
Legal.shipping.sections.processingTimeCo: Orders are typically processed and shipped within 1-2 business days. During peak seasons or sales, processing may take up to 3 business days.
Legal.shipping.sections.deliveryAreasCon: We ship to all EU countries and most international destinations. Some restrictions may apply to certain locations due to customs regulations.
Legal.shipping.sections.trackingInfoCont: Once your order ships, you will receive a confirmation email with tracking information. You can also track your order through your account dashboard.
Legal.shipping.sections.deliveryIssuesCo: If you experience any delivery issues, please contact us immediately. We will work with the shipping carrier to resolve the problem and ensure you receive your order.
Legal.shipping.sections.internationalShi: International orders may be subject to customs duties and taxes. These charges are the responsibility of the recipient and are not included in our shipping costs.
Legal.shipping.sections.signatureRequire: For orders over €100, a signature may be required upon delivery. This helps ensure the security of your valuable items.
Legal.shipping.sections.contactInfoConte: For questions about shipping, please contact us at info@natugraphia.com or call our customer service team.
Legal.privacy.sections.informationCollec: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, shipping address, and payment information.
Legal.privacy.sections.informationUsageC: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send you technical notices and support messages, and respond to your comments and questions.
Legal.privacy.sections.informationSharin: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.
Legal.privacy.sections.dataSecurityConte: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
Legal.privacy.sections.cookiesTrackingCo: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and understand where our visitors are coming from.
Legal.privacy.sections.thirdPartyService: We may use third-party services such as payment processors and analytics providers. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them.
Legal.privacy.sections.yourRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also have the right to restrict or object to certain processing of your information.
Legal.privacy.sections.policyChangesCont: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
Legal.privacy.sections.contactUsContent: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at info@natugraphia.com.
Legal.cookies.sections.whatAreCookiesCon: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and allow certain features to work properly.
Legal.cookies.sections.essentialCookiesC: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas.
Legal.cookies.sections.analyticsCookiesC: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
Legal.cookies.sections.functionalCookies: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and settings.
Legal.cookies.sections.thirdPartyCookies: We may use third-party services that place cookies on your device. These services help us analyze website traffic, provide customer support, and process payments.
Legal.cookies.sections.cookieLifespanCon: Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser, while persistent cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them manually.
Legal.cookies.sections.managingCookiesCo: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse cookies or delete them. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
Legal.cookies.sections.cookieConsentCont: When you first visit our website, you will see a cookie consent banner. By clicking "Accept," you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.
Legal.cookies.sections.policyUpdatesCont: We may update this cookie policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Modified" date.
Legal.cookies.sections.contactUsContent: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at info@natugraphia.com.
Legal.gdpr.sections.yourRightsContent: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) gives you several rights regarding your personal data. This page explains how you can exercise these rights.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToAccessContent: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we hold about you. This includes information about how we process your data and who we share it with.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToRectification: If you believe the personal data we hold about you is inaccurate or incomplete, you have the right to request that we correct or update it.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToErasure: 4. Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToErasureConten: You have the right to request that we delete your personal data in certain circumstances, such as when the data is no longer necessary for the purpose it was collected.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToRestrictConte: You have the right to request that we limit how we process your personal data in certain situations, such as when you contest the accuracy of the data.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToPortabilityCo: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format, and to transmit that data to another controller.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToObjectContent: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances, particularly for direct marketing purposes.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToWithdrawConte: If we process your personal data based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw that consent at any time. This will not affect the lawfulness of processing before the withdrawal.
Legal.gdpr.sections.howToExerciseContent: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@natugraphia.com. We will respond to your request within one month, though this period may be extended in certain circumstances.
Legal.gdpr.sections.dataProtectionOffice: If you have concerns about how we handle your personal data, you can contact our Data Protection Officer at dpo@natugraphia.com.
Legal.gdpr.sections.rightToComplainConte: If you believe we have not addressed your concerns adequately, you have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
Legal.gdpr.sections.contactInfoContent: For questions about your GDPR rights or to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@natugraphia.com.
Legal.terms.sections.acceptanceContent: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
Legal.terms.sections.licenseContent: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Natugraphia's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
Legal.terms.sections.disclaimerContent: The materials on Natugraphia's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Natugraphia makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
Legal.terms.sections.limitationsContent: In no event shall Natugraphia or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Natugraphia's website.
Legal.terms.sections.revisionsContent: The materials appearing on Natugraphia's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Natugraphia does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current.
Legal.terms.sections.linksContent: Natugraphia has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Natugraphia of the site.
Legal.terms.sections.modificationsConten: Natugraphia may revise these terms of use for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.
Legal.terms.sections.governingLawContent: Any claim relating to Natugraphia's website shall be governed by the laws of Spain without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
